1.0.0.name: drupal/banckle_helpdesk

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description: Banckle.Helpdesk is simple customer support help desk software. It works as a web based ticketing management system and becomes your collaborative team Inbox, which allows all team members to be on the same page with consolidated email communication. Easily integrate multiple email accounts under a single online help desk account.
